summary.Title: Produktchef
summary.Presentation:

Update item master data.
Start-up purchases and establishment orders.
Handling and coordinating returns.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Your primary tasks at Emballage Direct?

Update item master data.

Start-up purchases and establishment orders.

Handling and coordinating returns.

Follow-up and support to the sales department on revenue and profit calculations.

Supplier contact.

Competitor monitoring

We are a total of more than 50 employees in the organization, so there will be a lot of tasks that will create a varied and exciting everyday life. On a daily basis, you will be part of a team together with two other Product Managers, where you will work closely with the sales department.

 

Who are you and what is Emballage Direct looking for?

You must have experience with the mentioned tasks and be able to keep calm with many balls in the air. Don't be afraid to help out with tasks outside your primary area of work, as we all pull together and jump in to achieve our common goals. It is important that you are energetic and committed and can thrive in a hectic everyday life and handle the balls that are thrown to you.

 

We are looking for a colleague who sees opportunities for optimization and further development and has a solution-oriented approach, instead of one who sees limitations obstacles.

 

Do you want to be part of our team?

  • Then Emballage Direct offers an attractive job with good opportunities for both personal and professional development in an international and dynamic company, where you are offered attractive remuneration as well as mandatory canteen and pension scheme. The weekly working time is 37 hours.

 

Does the job sound exciting?

Then send your application as soon as possible with your CV to job@emballagedirect.dk, and write "Product Manager" in the subject line.
